snippet: “Eames: The Architect and the Painter” covers the lives of a couple whose approach to product design was in its way as influential as that of Steve Jobs.

Though many vegan diners are happy to fill their plates with side dishes, here are a few options that could work as a traditional main course.
abstract: Though many vegan diners are happy to fill their plates with side dishes, here are a few options that could work as a traditional main course.

headline.main: What's a Good Entree for a Vegan/Vegetarian Thanksgiving?

snippet: Many vegan diners don't require a main course and are happy to fill their plates with all the delicious vegetable side dishes found on a Thanksgiving table. However, many traditional holiday casseroles and mashed vegetable dishes contain milk, egg...
abstract: Many vegan diners don't require a main course and are happy to fill their plates with all the delicious vegetable side dishes found on a Thanksgiving table. However, many traditional holiday casseroles and mashed vegetable dishes contain milk, eggs, butter and cream, so they aren't suitable for vegan diners, who eat no animal products. If you want to serve a protein-rich vegan dish that works as a traditional main course, consider a hearty Curried Lentil, Squash and Apple Stew, or Harvest Stuffed Portobello Mushrooms, filled with savory lentil cashew stuffing and topped off with a sliver of sweet tomato and fresh thyme leaves.

headline.main: What's a Good Entree for a Vegan/Vegetarian Thanksgiving?

snippet: Hours before New York City police officers ousted protesters from Zuccotti Park in Lower Manhattan, Samantha Bee, a correspondent for "The Daily Show With Jon Stewart," found class division within the Occupy Wall Street camp. "On the one side, the...
abstract: Hours before New York City police officers ousted protesters from Zuccotti Park in Lower Manhattan, Samantha Bee, a correspondent for "The Daily Show With Jon Stewart," found class division within the Occupy Wall Street camp. "On the one side, the elites with their library, Apple pop-up store and bike-powered espresso machines," Ms. Bee said. "On the other, the downwardly mobile with their drum circles."

snippet: Newt Gingrich received $1.6 million to $1.8 million from Freddie Mac for providing strategic advice, Bloomberg News reported.
abstract: Newt Gingrich is on the defensive following report that he earned $1.6 million to $1.8 million while consulting for mortgage giant Freddie Mac, which has since been taken over by the federal government.

headline.main: Gingrich on Defensive Over Freddie Mac Fees
headline.print_headline: Gingrich on the Defensive Over Hefty Freddie Mac Fees
